declarations.description:

```js 
import '@innofake/omni-components/check'; 
```

slots.description: Replaces the icon for the indeterminate state

slots.description: Replaces the icon for the checked state

members.name: label
members.description: The label text.

members.name: data
members.description: Data associated with the component.

members.name: hint
members.description: A hint message to assist the user.

members.description: Indicator if the component is checked or not.

members.name: disabled
members.description: Indicator if the component is disabled.

members.name: indeterminate
members.description: Indicator if the component is in and indeterminate state.

events.name: value-change
events.description: Dispatched when the control value is changed to either on or off.

declarations.description:
A control to syntax highlight and display source code.

```js 
import '@innofake/omni-components/code'; 
```
declarations.name: Code

members.name: header
members.description: Renders a small header above the block itself.

members.name: language
members.description: Programming language used, e.g. html, css, javascript, etc.

members.name: content
members.description: Raw text to parse as content. If this property is specified, it will take precedence over slotted content. This should also be used if you are using dynamic content

attributes.name: header
attributes.description: Renders a small header above the block itself.

attributes.name: language
attributes.description: Programming language used, e.g. html, css, javascript, etc.

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: Raw text to parse as content. If this property is specified, it will take precedence over slotted content. This should also be used if you are using dynamic content

declarations.description:
Component that displays an icon

```js 
import '@innofake/omni-components/icon'; 
```
declarations.name: Icon

members.name: size
members.description: The size to display the icon at. Options include: - `default` Icon size is 24px. - `extra-small` Icon size is 8px. - `small` Icon size is 16px. - `medium` Icon size is 32px. - `large` Icon size is 48px.

members.name: icon
members.description: The name of the icon to display. Takes preference over the slotted icon

attributes.name: size
attributes.description: The size to display the icon at. Options include: - `default` Icon size is 24px. - `extra-small` Icon size is 8px. - `small` Icon size is 16px. - `medium` Icon size is 32px. - `large` Icon size is 48px.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: The name of the icon to display. Takes preference over the slotted icon

declarations.description:
A simple label component that renders a styled text string.

```js 
import '@innofake/omni-components/label'; 
```
declarations.name: Label

members.name: label
members.description: The label string to display.

members.name: type
members.description: The type of label to display: - `default` Normal font weight. - `title` Larger font and weight. - `subtitle` Larger font and weight. - `strong` Largest font and weight.

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: The label string to display.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: The type of label to display: - `default` Normal font weight. - `title` Larger font and weight. - `subtitle` Larger font and weight. - `strong` Largest font and weight.

declarations.description:
Base class used to create a contextual observable store. 

Core concepts and capabilities include:
- Be default store state is immutable (recommended).
- Consumers can subscribe to store state changes via exposed RxJS Observables.
- Store state change history can be captured and accessed (in memory only).
- Store state changes can be logged to console.

```js 
import { Store } from '@innofake/omni-components/store'; 
```
declarations.name: Store

members.name: stateHistory
members.description: Exposes store state history only if settings had "trackStateHistory: true" set.

members.name: stateChanged
members.description: Provides RxJS Observable that can be subscribed to in order to retrieve store changes.

members.name: stateChangedWithName
members.description: Provides RxJS Observable that can be subscribed to in order to retrieve store changes and state name.

members.name: stateChangedNoPayload
members.description: Provides RxJS Observable that can be subscribed to in order to be notified of store changes.

members.name: stateChangedNoPayloadWithName
members.description: Provides RxJS Observable that can be subscribed to in order to be notified of store changes with state name.

members.name: stateChangedProperties
members.description:
Provides RxJS Observable that can be subscribed to in order to retrieve store changes, 
includes properties that changed as well.

members.name: stateChangedPropertiesWithName
members.description:
Provides RxJS Observable that can be subscribed to in order to retrieve store changes, 
includes properties that changed as well as state name.

members.name: getState

parameters.name: deepCloneReturnedState
parameters.description:
When true, returns a cloned copy of the store state (recommended). 

NOTE: When false and the settings had "persistence: 'memory'", a reference to the store state will 
be returned and it's up to the consumer to ensure the state isn't changed from the outside.

members.description: Gets store state.

members.name: getStateProperty

parameters.name: propertyName
parameters.description: Name of the property to return from the store state.

parameters.name: deepCloneReturnedState
parameters.description:
When true, returns a cloned copy of the store state (recommended). 

NOTE: When false and the settings had "persistence: 'memory'", a reference to the store state will 
be returned and it's up to the consumer to ensure the state isn't changed from the outside.

members.description: Gets store state for a given property.

members.name: setState

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: State to set, can be an object or a function that accepts latest state as input parameter.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Descriptive name for state action, e.g. "CLIENT_ADD".

parameters.name: dispatchState
parameters.description: When true, notifies subscribers of state changes.

parameters.name: deepCloneState
parameters.description: When true, clones latest state before performing state update.

members.description:
Sets store state. 

NOTE: State to set MUST be serializable to and from JSON for immutability support 
and / or supported persistence mechanisms.

members.name: clearState

parameters.name: dispatchState
parameters.description: When true, notifies subscribers of state changes.

members.description: Clears store state.

members.name: resetState

parameters.name: dispatchState
parameters.description: When true, notifies subscribers of state changes.

members.description: Resets store state, includes clearing store state history.

members.name: clearStateHistory
members.description: Clears store state history.

members.name: name
members.description: Unique name of the store, e.g. "client-store".

members.name: persistence
members.description:
{"memory"|"sessionStorage|"localStorage"} [persistence="memory"] Where to persist store data to:
- "memory" - All state is stored in memory for the current session, i.e. it cannot survive page reloads.
- "sessionStorage" - All state is stored in domain storage for the current session only, i.e it can survive page reloads as long as the tab remains open.
- "localStorage" - All state is stored in local storage , i.e it can survive page reloads and browser reopen

members.name: trackStateHistory
members.description:
[trackStateHistory=false] When true, stores the state mutation history.

NOTE this will perpetually grow memory use within the current session and usage thereof
should be carefully considered, if needed at all.

members.name: logStateChanges
members.description: [logStateChanges=false] When true, logs the state mutation history to console.

declarations.name: DefaultCssProperties
declarations.description: The default css variables defined as a cssProps object used in https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ljcl/storybook-addon-cssprops

declarations.name: getValue

parameters.name: separator
parameters.description: Separator to the path split on.

declarations.description: Retrieves the value from the object in a nested fashion. Specify a path as e.g. "food.fruit.apple". Click [here](https://hackernoon.com/accessing-nested-objects-in-javascript-f02f1bd6387f) for more info.

declarations.name: setValue

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: Value to set for the path.

parameters.name: separator
parameters.description: Separator to the path split on.

declarations.description:
Assigns the value to the object in a nested fashion.
Specify a path as e.g. "food.fruit.apple".

declarations.name: hasValue
declarations.description: Check if the current value is non-null or non-undefined

declarations.name: groupBy

parameters.name: target
parameters.description:
Grouping target:
- ```String``` as property to group on, e.g. "userId"
- ```Function``` as [Array.prototype.reduce()](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array/reduce#Syntax) callback function.

declarations.description: Group by method for an array.

declarations.name: isFunction
declarations.description: Determines if the given value is a [function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Glossary/Function).

declarations.name: isObject
declarations.description: Determines if a given value is an Object.

declarations.name: isPromise
declarations.description: Determines if a given value is a Promise.

declarations.name: formatBytes

parameters.name: decimals
parameters.description: Number of decimals to return. Default to 2

declarations.description: Returns a formatted string with easier to read values for file sizes

declarations.name: deepCopy
declarations.description: Creates and returns a deep copy of an Object or Array.

declarations.name: isURL
declarations.description: Determines if a given string is a Url.
